info.about:
You see a blank gml-raptor project here.
Only 1 Font, no Button Sprites, this is all default.
Hover over elements, some of them
offer a tooltip that tells you,
where you can find the code in the project
for that specific item.

Oh, btw, the font is set as scribble_font_set_default in the Game_Configuration script!

how_to_play_states.title: How to play
how_to_play_states.text:
Move your character with WASD keys.

In the middle of the screen, a [c_yellow]Spawner[/] will appear.
It spits out [c_yellow]enemies[/] every now and then.

They see you when you enter their yellow [c_yellow]Scanner range[/].

[shake]Then you die.[/]

If you can touch an enemy on its back side, [shake]then the enemy dies![/]

[c_orange]Try to survive as long as you can!

how_to_play_race.title: Race Demo
how_to_play_race.text:
This is a short demo filling a playing field, that could be any Match-3 game
with random gems using [c_yellow]RaceTables[/].

You can modify the chances and enabled states with the controls.

This room contains a [c_yellow]RaceController[/] and a [c_yellow]RaceTable[/] object.

[scale,1.25][c_yellow]WARNING![/] This is a [c_yellow]DEMO[/] Program!
The InputBoxes perform no type-checking!
If you enter nonsense (i.e. no numbers as Chance), it will crash!

Click the [c_yellow]Run[/] button to fill the board.

game_over.title: Game over
game_over.text:
You got caught!

But you could at least eliminate [c_yellow]{0}[/] enemies!

Now we're heading back to the [c_yellow]Main Menu[/].
